ModuleDescription: This is a six-week module specially designed for students majoring in Engineering. It introduces the basic concepts in linear algebra with applications in engineering. Major topics: Matrix algebra, linear system of equations, vector spaces, linear independence, basis, orthogonality, rank, linear transformations, eigenvalues and eigenvectors, diagonalization, linear systems of differential equations, linearization of nonlinear systems.
Prerequisite: GCE ‘A’ level or H2 Mathematics or H2 Further Mathematics or equivalent
Preclusion: MA1101R, MA1311, MA1506, MA1508, MA1508E (2 way preclusion)
